title: Ticket #4372: CCB refuses a reconnect from wrong IP
description:
I recently noticed this in the CMS collector log files: 

05/22/14 10:13:28 CCB: reconnect request from target daemon MASTER <172.18.97.213:52122?CCBID=128.142.187.77:9716#577392%20131.225.191.126:10147#132021&noUDP> on <128.211.155.37:7275> with ccbid 577392 has wrong IP!  (expected IP=128.211.155.33)

If you look at the IP address, the reconnect is happening from a different IP because the client is shunted onto a different hardware NAT device. It seems the reconnect is indeed valid - could HTCondor allow it?
